body:
```
packages:
  all:
    compiler: [clang, gcc]
    providers:
      mpi: [openmpi]
      blas: [openblas]
      lapack: [openblas]
  libtool:
    compiler: [clang]
  python:
    compiler: [clang]
```

`libtool`/`python` are not used with `clang`:

```

      ^blas
      ^lapack
      ^python@2.6:2.7
          ^bzip2
          ^ncurses
          ^openssl
              ^zlib
          ^readline
          ^sqlite

Concretized
------------------------------
```
